column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We just landed in Chicago for a friend's weekend wedding and searched for "best breakfast in Chicago" and wildberry popped up. We were a little worried that there might be a wait based on other reviews but on a Friday at 9am
column2: it's super busy but no wait. I got a honey latte that is the best coffee I've had in a long time. The biscuits and gravy was delicious (especially the gravy) and the gluten free honey pancakes hit the spot. Well
column3: now I'm stuffed and have waddle out of here to do some shopping. Would definitely recommend!
